overview:
Holly is an executive with 20 years experience, serving in a variety of roles at Sprint including Assistant Controller of the wireless unit, director of Financial Planning and Analysis, Vice President of Receivables Management and Divisional CFO supporting $10 billion in revenue and $1 billion in expense. She was a CPA in the audit division of Arthur Andersen, and has expertise in retail, manufacturing, SEC engagements and mergers and acquisitions. Holly’s previous clients include Hallmark Cards, Collective Brands and Cessna Aircraft.

Holly graduated with High Distinction from the University of Nebraska - Lincoln with a BS in Business Administration, Accounting emphasis.
